references.reason: This paper introduces the foundation of denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which is the core technology leveraged in the current paper for video editing.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper presents the high-resolution image synthesis method using latent diffusion models, which is fundamental to the current paper's video editing approach.
This paper proposes denoising diffusion implicit models, a crucial technique for efficient sampling in diffusion models which is the basis for the video editing method.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces a theoretical framework for score-based generative modeling, which underpins the method in the current paper.
This paper provides improved denoising diffusion probabilistic models which are essential for better image and video generation quality.
